entry.title: [WAW1][Cooling System] - Rack WAW0106A06B maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Nov 20, 07:00 - 15:00 UTC

Oct 13, 13:42 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, a maintenance is scheduled on our cooling infrastructure.

Thank you for your understanding.
